query:
WITH package_cte AS (
                    SELECT id
                    FROM debian_repository_package
                    WHERE
                        tenant_id = $1
                        AND sha256sum = $2
                    LIMIT 1
                )
                INSERT INTO debian_repository_component_package (
                    component_id,
                    package_id,
                    filename,
                    created_at,
                    updated_at
                )
                SELECT
                    $3,
                    package_cte.id,
                    $4,
                    NOW(),
                    NOW()
                FROM package_cte
                ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
